July 3, 1893 D Merthyr Contest
Merthyr Contest 100 Test Piece Contest South Wales & Monmouthshire Brass Band Association merthyr-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Verdi [arr. Round]
Penydarren Park, Merthyr 3rd annual contest of South Wales and Monmouth Association Open Section. 7 bands entered, 5 competed Soprano prize: Llanelly, Trombone prize: Aberaman Prizes: £15, £10, £5, £2
April 7, 2012, 8:35 a.m. June 7, 2019, 2:21 p.m.
1 Llanelly Town James Samuel
2 Aberaman James Prestwood
3 Blaina & District Edward Sutton
4 Aberdare Town G. Rains
5 Dowlais Town Unknown
